message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, Bob.  However, the value of this product to me is quite a bit higher.  Could we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
